subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Calvin Brock is the rare heavyweight boxer who requires a corner man, a cut man and a dance man. He will fight Wladimir Klitschko Saturday night for the I.B.F. heavyweight title.
snippet: Calvin Brock is the rare heavyweight boxer who requires a corner man, a cut man and a dance man. He will fight Wladimir Klitschko Saturday night for the I.B.F. heavyweight title.
